title: xLays
author: xLays
content: Upon checking this thread: BitcoinCleanup.com charity  I noticed this, just wanted to share that I've noticed the word 'Merited' has turned green now. Correct me if I'm wrong, but it was black before, right?

comments.author: TryNinja
comments.body: I'm pretty sure it was green from day 1.Here is an archive from 2018: https://web.archive.org/web/20180918041131/https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2818350.0

comments.author: MusaMohamed
comments.body: Quote from: xLays on October 05, 2023, 05:05:03 AMUpon checking this thread: BitcoinCleanup.com charity  I noticed this, just wanted to share that I've noticed the word 'Merited' has turned green now. Correct me if I'm wrong, but it was black before, right?It is always green. You only did not notice it before, till today. Highlight is always in Green.Quote from: theymos on January 24, 2018, 11:00:11 PM - Highlighting good posts with the "Merited by" line.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: It's always green since the day it was introduced. I search and found this github page[1] with a screenshot a merited post/reply posted 4 years ago.Btw, i don't know whos github page is that.[1] https://github.com/blackout314/greasemoney-btctalk_archiveis
